title: Introducing O and M
creator_credit: Anvil Films and British Productivity Council
brief_description: The introduction of an organisation and methods man into a large company. Emphasises the need for a new outlook by management and staff before he can start his work, and follows the course of the O and M (Organisation and Methods) investigation.
